text: Nan adarasi, kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei. Kɨ ti pura gumazitamɨn akam ia mɨkɨnizɨ ia anetegha akar igharazimɨn gɨn zui, ezɨ kɨ ti dɨgavir kuram gamighan koghai. Ezɨ gumazitam akar aghuir kam na ganɨngizir puvatɨ. Egha gumazitam akar kam nan sure gamizir puvatɨ. Krais Iesus uabɨ akar aghuir kam nan akazɨ kɨ a gɨfo. Kamaghɨn ia foghasa, kɨ ia mɨgei, akar aghuir kɨ ia mɨkɨnizim, kar puram akar gumazitamɨn akamɨn otozir puvatɨzim.
